channel.title: HALCON: Tips of the Day
channel.description: Tips and tricks for HALCON users.

item.title: Organize Windows
item.description: When having many overlapping windows, use 'Window -> Organize Windows' (Ctrl+Shift+W,O) to regain the overview making the four most important HDevelop windows accessible again.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Move the Tool Bar
item.description: If the height of the main window is not sufficient, you can get some more height by dragging the elements of the tool bar by their dragging points from the top to the side of the main window.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Use the Full Screen
item.description: If the height of the main window is not sufficient, you can get some more height using 'Window -> Full Screen' (Ctrl+Shift+W,F) to fade out the window title.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Output Console
item.description: Double-clicking onto the message area of the status bar opens the output console with a log of the most recent messages including HALCON low-level errors.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Save Window
item.description: Right-clicking in the graphics window you can use the 'Save Window...' entry from the context menu (Ctrl+Shift+G,S) to save the content of the current window into an image.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Inspect Pixels
item.description: The gray value and image coordinates of a pixel at the position of the mouse cursor are displayed in the status bar or, holding down the Ctrl key, next to the mouse cursor.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Mouse Precision
item.description: Using 'Visualization -> Position Precision' you can select the precision in which the mouse positions are returned. By default, integer values are used (precision 0).
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Interactive ROI Generation
item.description: The graphics window provides a tool bar icon to access the ROI window. There, you can interactively draw ROIs and XLDs and perform simple measurements.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Drag-and-Drop Images
item.description: To open an image from file you can simply drag it from a file browser to the HDevelop window and drop it there.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Inspect Functions
item.description: Right-clicking on a numeric tuple in the variable window you can use the 'Plot as Function' entry from the context menu to plot a function interpreting the tuple values as y values for equidistant x values.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Scatter Plot
item.description: Right-clicking on a pair of numeric tuples of equal length in the variable window (select both tuples simultaneously using the Ctrl key) you can use the 'Plot as X/Y pair(s)' entry from the context menu to generate a scatter plot.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Inspect Variables
item.description: Double-clicking a control variable in the variable window opens an inspection window with variable-specific functionality.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Inspect 3D Object Models
item.description: Double-clicking the handle of a 3D object model in the variable window opens an inspection window with information about the model and the possibility to interactively display it.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Live Display
item.description: Double-clicking the handle of an image acquisition device in the variable window opens an inspection window with parameter information and the possibility of a live display.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Save Variable Content
item.description: Right-clicking on a variable name in the variable window you can use the 'Save' entry from the context menu to save the content of the variable to file.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Copy Variable Content
item.description: Right-clicking on a name of a control variable in the variable window you can use the 'Copy' entry from the context menu (Ctrl+C) to copy the content of the variable and paste it (Ctrl+V), e.g., at a selected position in the program listing.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Profiling Programs
item.description: Using 'Execute -> Activate Profiler' (Ctrl+Shift+F,F) you can inspect the execution times of single lines of code and thus find bottlenecks in your programs.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Call Stack
item.description: Using 'Execute -> Thread View / Call Stack' (Ctrl+Shift+O,C) you can visualize the hierarchy of the procedures that were currently called on HDevelop's internal call stack.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Operator Suggestions
item.description: When having selected an operator call in the program window, the menu 'Suggestions' provides suggestions for alternative, preceeding, and succeeding operator calls.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Tool Tips for a Program Line
item.description: Resting the mouse pointer on an operator, procedure, or variable name within the program window displays a tool tip providing specific information, e.g., the name and (parts of) the content of a variable.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Open Procedures in new Tabs
item.description: Pressing the Ctrl key while selecting a procedure from the drop-down list of the program window displays the procedure in a new tab card.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Create Procedures from Code
item.description: To create procedures from existing code, simply select the corresponding code in the program listing and open the procedure interface dialog using 'Procedures -> Create New Procedure...' (Ctrl+Shift+P,C) to setup the new procedure.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Copy Procedures
item.description: To copy an internal procedure that is just open in the program window, select 'Procedures -> Duplicate...' and enter a new name in the corresponding dialog.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Assistants
item.description: Via the menu 'Assistants' you can access assistants that guide you through often needed tasks like image acquisition, camera calibration, matching, 1D measuring, or OCR.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Image Acquisition Assistant
item.description: Use 'Assistants -> Open New Image Acquisition' or the corresponding tool bar button to acquire images and adjust the parameters of your image acquisition device.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Copy and Paste
item.description: To comfortably copy program code and procedures between different HDevelop programs you can start multiple instances of HDevelop.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Auto Indenting
item.description: With Ctrl+A followed by Ctrl+Shift+I you can automatically select and indent all program lines of the current program window when working with the full text editor.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Advanced Autocompletion
item.description: Using the Tab key, advanced autocompletion is possible when working with the full text editor.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Behavior of Return key
item.description: Via 'Edit -> Preferences -> General Options -> General Options' or the corresponding tool bar button in the program window you can change the behavior of the Return key from 'enter and execute' to 'enter'.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: View Procedures
item.description: With Alt+Ctrl+Enter you can view or edit a selected procedure in a new tab.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Program Line View
item.description: Using 'Window -> Open Program Line View' (Ctrl+Shift+O,R) you can manage your program lines, e.g., navigate between bookmarked program lines or list lines containing a search term.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Set Bookmarks
item.description: Using 'Set Bookmark' of the program window's context menu (Ctrl+F11) you can set temporary bookmarks to quickly navigate between important program lines of large programs.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com

item.title: Code Export
item.description: Using 'File -> Export...' (Ctrl+Shift+O,X) or the corresponding tool bar button you can export a developed HDevelop program to several programming languages.
item.author: MVTec Software GmbH, webmaster@mvtec.com
